display_long_description:
Rule the skies of modern battlefield in Warplanes: Air Corp in VR. The third installment of the best-selling Warplanes series introduces a new era of modern military aviation. In addition to fighter jets and a variety of military aircraft you are able to pilot attack helicopters!

Play single-player campaign or fight online in co-op or classic PvP multiplayer. You can relax and play on your terms in Free Flight mode. Variety of settings enables you to customize the flight model, controls, as well as combat support systems to suit your preferences and skill level.

Utilize advanced tactics – destroy high-tech air defense systems using helicopters, reduce the range of artillery by destroying mobile radars.

Upgrade your machines – buy modern armaments, adjust them according to mission objectives, so as to inflict the greatest damage on the enemy.  

Fight in the air against a wide range of enemies. Destroy a variety of naval and modern military units. Fight in urbanized areas, destroy or protect strategic infrastructure. Use all available units to raze enemy military bases.

● Acquire machines inspired by the best combat aircraft and helicopters from around the world.
● Enjoy a friendly, customizable flight model with intuitive controls.
● Carry out a wide range of missions in diverse locations across the globe.
● Engage in classic PvP multiplayer modes, facing off against players from around the globe.
● Gather your friends and play co-op missions.
